text: bhala vah kaun hai jisane aasamaan aur zameen ko paida kiya aur tumhaare vaaste aasamaan se paanee barasaaya phir ham hee ne paanee se dil chasp (khushanuma) baag uthae tumhaare to ye bas kee baat na thee ki tum unake darakhton ko uga sakate to kya khuda ke saath koee aur maabood bhee hai (haragiz nahin) balki ye log khud apane jee se gadh ke buto ko usake baraabar banaate hain
